title: Can Our Economy Handle This?
description:
In the face of the coronavirus outbreak, U.S. political leaders are moving faster than they have in years. But it still might not be fast enough.
Guest: Jordan Weissmann, Slate’s senior business and economics correspondent. 
Slate Plus members get bonus segments and ad-free podcast feeds. Sign up now.

itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: Congress is dithering while the Fed tries to prevent a financial disaster.
